jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - Responsible AI
jobs.description: The AI Integrity team is a part of Responsible AI, an organization dedicated to ensuring all AI systems built by Microsoft are safe, secure, and beneficial to society. The AI Integrity team is focused on addressing explicitly adversarial behavior: protecting our customers from fraud and abuse, predicting and preventing future attacks, efficient mitigation of ongoing threats. In this role, you will design and implement backend services and data tools that discover, detect and stop various abuses ...
